title: Motley Fool Money: 06.10.2011
description: JPMorgan Chase CEO Jamie Dimon challenges Fed Chief Ben Bernanke.  Hewlett-Packard attempts to challenge Apple's iPad.  Big banks lose a big vote in Congress.  And Hasbro introduces a heavy metal version of Monopoly.  Plus, Pawn Stars star Rick Harrison makes the case for silver over gold and talks about his new book, License To Pawn: Deals, Steals, and My Life at the Gold & Silver.
